forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 3C.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Lows overnight in the upper 30s.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 38F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Clearing skies after some morning light rain. High 44F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing late. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady light rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low 37F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 44F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 45F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear in the evening then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow after midnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear in the evening then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow after midnight. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.
